# How to cite Biodose Tools {#appendix-cite}

If you want to cite Biodose Tools, you can use the following BibTeX entry:

```tex
@Manual{BiodoseTools2019,
  title = {{Biodose Tools}},
  author = {Alfredo Hernández and Joan Francesc Barquinero and
            David Endesfelder and Pere Puig and Lleonard Barrios and
            Jochen Einbeck and Amine Benadjaoud and Elizabeth Ainsbury
            and Ulrike Kulka and Eric Grègoire and Manuel Higueras and 
            Gruel Gaëtan and Ursula Oestreicher and David Lloyd},
  year = {2019},
  url = {https://biodosetools-team.github.io/documentation/},
}
```

You can download the BibTex entry clicking [here](https://biodosetools-team.github.io/documentation/data/biodose-tools.bib).
